name: Team Spirit!
description:
Made during the Miami game Design Club's New Years Game Jam. The theme was spirit and we decided to take a unique approach. Control the band, shop, cheerleaders, and crowd to help your team win!

Needs a controller to play, Xbox recommended. 

Art by Kal: kalg336.itch.io

Code by Sam and Lukas: tricenatops.itch.io, lukew122.itch.io
